title: Zola: How a road trip became a viral story of sex trafficking
description: The epic Twitter saga of a 19-year-old that attracted thousands of followers hits the big screen.

title: Will Turkey's bees return after the wildfires?
description: Residents of Marmaris, Turkey, are mourning their bees and honey, lost to fires.

title: Sharks from above: Filming 'friendly' encounters in Sydney
description: Jason Iggleden captures stunning moments in Sydney, often helping to reduce people's fear.

title: COP26: How serious is the government about climate conference?
description: With less than 90 days to go to Glasgow climate summit, there is uncertainty surrounding the event.

title: Fish with 'human' teeth caught in North Carolina
description: The creature, caught in North Carolina, is believed to be a sheepshead fish.

title: 'If he had stayed at Villa he would be immortal' - but where does Grealish fit in at Man City?
description: BBC Sport takes a closer look at what Jack Grealish will bring to Manchester City after signing from Aston Villa for £100m.

title: Afghan war: I can still hear my cry, says mother of dead soldier
description: As fighting in Afghanistan rages, the BBC speaks to the mother of a British soldier who died there nearly 10 years ago.

title: Ben Elliot: Conservative Party money man with A-list connections
description: Tory fundraiser and co-chairman Ben Elliot is at the centre of controversy over an elite donors club.

title: Climate Change: Half US cars to be zero-emission by 2030 - Biden
description: Cars produce nearly a third of US carbon emissions and sales of electric vehicles lag behind Europe.

title: Cat death rise: 'It feels like we've lost a family member'
description: As cat deaths mount from a fatal disease, an investigation into a possible link to pet food continues.

title: Sports Direct's Mike Ashley to hand reins to future son-in-law
description: The tycoon, whose empire also includes House of Fraser and Evans Cycles, is set to hand power to his future son-in-law.

title: Mike Ashley: Who is the founder of Sports Direct?
description: Profile of Sports Direct founder and Newcastle United billionaire owner Mike Ashley.

title: Migrant crossings: Record 482 cross English Channel in one day
description: According to Home Office figures, there have now been 10,236 arrivals in 434 boats so far in 2021.

title: Aya Hachem: Men jailed for student's drive-by murder
description: Aya Hachem was "in the wrong place at the wrong time" when she was shot in a feud between tyre firms.

title: Number pinged by Covid app falls significantly
description: The fall come ahead of changes to the app to make it notify fewer contacts.

title: Bridgend: Man in court accused of Logan Mwangi murder
description: Logan Mwangi was found dead in the River Ogmore in Bridgend county on Saturday.

title: Paul Embery: Pro-Brexit fire union official unfairly sacked, tribunal finds
description: A tribunal finds Paul Embery was subject to a "witch hunt" after appearing at a Leave Means Leave rally.

title: Walls wins GB's first track cycling gold in Tokyo
description: Matt Walls wins Britain's 50th medal of Tokyo 2020 by taking gold in the omnium as Liam Heath wins a bronze in the men's kayak and Galal Yafai shines in the boxing ring.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Matt Walls wins gold medal in men's omnium
description: Great Britain's Matt Walls wins the Olympic gold medal with a dominant performance in the men's omnium.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Team GB's Matt Walls wins omnium gold
description: Team GB cyclist Matt Walls is crowned Olympic champion on his debut with a dominant performance in the men's omnium.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Michael Johnson reacts to USA's relay failure to reach final in 4x100m
description: Michael Johnson describes the USA's failure to qualify for the final of the 4x100m men's relay for the time since Sydney 2000 as "embarrassing and ridiculous".

title: Tokyo Olympics: China's Quan Hongchan, 14, wins diving gold with three 10s
description: Watch as China's Quan Hongchan wins gold in the women's 10m platform event with three perfect 10s, finishing with a score of 466.20.

title: Covid travel: France moves to amber list and green list expands
description: Up to 6,000 Britons are currently in Mexico, which is moving to the red list, Grant Shapps says.

title: Alex Yee: 'I didn't feel worthy to stand on the start line'
description: Alex Yee, 23, won two medals at the Olympics - but had self-worth issues when he first turned pro.

title: How a fake network pushes pro-China propaganda
description: The web of 350 fake social media profiles aims to discredit the West, sometimes with garish cartoons.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Galal Yafai beats Saken Bibossinov to reach flyweight final
description: Great Britain's Galal Yafai reaches the Olympic flyweight final with a thrilling win over Saken Bibossinov of Kazakhstan.

title: Wesley Fofana: Leicester City defender suffers broken leg in friendly
description: Leicester defender Wesley Fofana confirms he has suffered a broken leg in a pre-season friendly against Villarreal.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Kayaking bronze, Asher-Smith returns and skateboarding success on day 13
description: Watch the best moments from the early events on day 13 at the Tokyo Olympics, including a GB bronze in the sprint kayak and the return of Dina Asher-Smith in the 4x100m relay.

title: 'I run my business from my pimped-up camper van'
description: Liam Chester was burnt out with work so he converted a camper van to take his office into nature.

title: The Papers: 'French reconnection' and 'Sky on a high'
description: Thursday's front pages focus on the changes to Covid travel rules and celebrate skateboarder Sky Brown's Olympic success.

title: Peter Bol: The Sudanese-Australian runner who lifted a nation
description: Peter Bol's Olympics has delighted Australians, becoming a "symbol of what we can aspire to be".

title: Tokyo Olympics: Keegan Palmer wins first men's park skateboarding gold
description: Australian 18-year-old Keegan Palmer wins gold in the first Olympic men's park skateboarding final at Tokyo 2020.

title: 'You're not gay, you've had girlfriends' - non-league boss Morton discusses coming out
description: As his team gets ready to play in the FA Cup extra preliminary round, Thetford Town player-manager Matt Morton speaks about how he came out to his team-mates.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Asher-Smith returns as GB set new record to reach the 4x100m relay final
description: Dina Asher-Smith returns as Great Britain set a new national record to reach the women's 4x100m relay final.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Britain's Liam Heath claims bronze in men's kayak single 200m
description: Great Britain's Liam Heath claims a bronze medal after a "hesitant start" to the defence of his Olympic men's kayak single 200m.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Hector Pardoe pulls out of marathon swim after eye hit by elbow
description: Great Britain's Hector Pardoe says he pulled out of the Tokyo Olympics marathon swim after being hit in the eye by an elbow during the race.
